translation.en: THE ISLAND OF LAMPEDUSA MEDITERRANEAN SEA
♪ That I won't let it go ♪ ♪ I thought that it was enough ♪ 5 YEARS LATER ♪ But I don't want to say goodbye... ♪
[man, in English] We are terribly sorry, but it was possible to regain
translation.it: Siamo molto spiacenti, ma siamo riusciti a recuperare

translation.en: only 12 percent of your family's assets.
translation.it: solo il 12% dei beni della sua famiglia.

translation.en: In the future, we recommend a more heterogeneous investment portfolio.
translation.it: In futuro, le consigliamo un portafoglio di investimenti più eterogeneo.

translation.en: This investment was also highly recommended by you.
translation.it: Ci aveva consigliato anche questo investimento.

translation.en: [in Polish] Have you packed your shit already?
[in English] Please, could anyone tell me what the hell happened here yesterday?
translation.it: Per favore, qualcuno può spiegarmi cosa diavolo è successo qui ieri?

translation.en: [man] It's impossible. -Refund, and ten percent interest. -[door slams]
translation.it: - Impossibile. - Rimborso e il dieci percento.

translation.en: Until the end of the month.
Excuse my language, but you need to have balls to do this job.
translation.it: Scusi la volgarità, ma servono le palle per questo lavoro.
Non ha senso continuare a discuterne.

translation.en: -First of all, it's not my fault. -Listen, ma'am--
translation.it: - Innanzitutto, non è colpa mia. - Ascolti.

translation.en: And it's not my job to temper rowdy customers.
translation.it: Non è compito mio far calmare i clienti.

translation.en: And I think you should rather tell us
there were only two security guards.
translation.it: ci fossero solo due uomini della sicurezza.

translation.en: Word... It is all about word that you've given to my family.
translation.it: La sua parola. Aveva dato la sua parola alla mia famiglia.

translation.en: You have this game in America, right?
translation.it: È un gioco che fate voi americani, no?

translation.en: I checked in the band at our hotel on purpose.
translation.it: Ho fatto soggiornare la band nel nostro hotel di proposito.

translation.en: And because of yesterday's incident, we are in media from the US to Japan.
translation.it: Grazie a ieri, si parla di noi dagli Stati Uniti al Giappone.

translation.en: [young man] I thought that when it comes to sexual preferences, nothing would surprise me,
translation.it: In fatto di gusti sessuali, pensavo che niente avrebbe potuto stupirmi.

translation.en: What would your loving husband say about that?
translation.it: Cosa direbbe il suo amato marito?

translation.en: You've embarrassed us in the eyes of entire world.
translation.it: Ci ha messo in imbarazzo davanti al mondo.

translation.en: We all know how the media and the stock market will react
translation.it: Sappiamo come reagiranno media e mercato azionario,

translation.en: when I make it all public.
There have been so many reservations
that we are overbooked for the next four weekends.
translation.it: che siamo in overbooking per quattro weekend.

translation.en: bank shares will fall by half.
It was possible because of my strategy.
translation.it: E tutto grazie alla mia strategia.

translation.en: Age and sex had nothing to do with it.
translation.it: Età e sesso non c'entrano nulla.

translation.en: After a month, I will buy it for peanuts,
translation.it: Dopo un mese li comprerò per due soldi,

translation.en: [in Polish] This is exactly what you need balls for.
What are you gonna do about my money?
translation.it: Cosa farà per i miei soldi?

translation.en: Damn, I have to finish this.
Give me like half an hour, okay?
Can't you just take a small break?
translation.it: Non puoi fare una piccola pausa?

translation.en: We have a plane to catch in the morning.
You shouldn't strain yourself with that weak heart of yours.
translation.it: Non sforzarti troppo, coi tuoi problemi di cuore.

translation.en: Besides, you probably haven't packed for us yet, right?
translation.it: E poi, hai già preparato le nostre valigie?

translation.en: [in Polish] Let's drink to the health of the sexiest, the best,
translation.it: Beviamo alla salute della donna più sexy, più meravigliosa e migliore

translation.en: and most wonderful woman in the world...
translation.it: Beviamo alla salute della donna più sexy, più meravigliosa e migliore del mondo...

translation.en: I was just kidding! I'm sorry. I meant my lovely Laura,
translation.it: Scherzo, scusami! Ovviamente intendevo la mia bella Laura,

translation.en: who will, in a second, turn... 29.
translation.it: che, fra un secondo, compirà 29 anni.

translation.en: [Laura] Come on, you make me feel old.
[in Polish] What are you up to?
Jesus, Martin, you are such a dumbass.
To be honest... I didn't order it.
All right, so we probably should drink to--
No. Wait, I have to go to the bathroom.
translation.it: No, aspetta. Devo andare in bagno.
Non posso oppormi alla piramide dei bisogni di Maslow.

translation.en: [in English] Are you lost, baby girl?
[in Polish] Look! Our wine is here. That's what I'm talking about.
translation.it: È arrivato il vino, proprio quello che ci voleva.

translation.en: [in Polish] God, why do these seagulls have to be so loud?
translation.it: Dio, perché i gabbiani fanno tanto casino?

translation.en: As you can see, the child is playing in the wading pool.
translation.it: A giocare nella piscina per bambini.

translation.en: I don't know. He wasn't there when I woke up.
translation.it: Non c'era, quando mi sono svegliata.

translation.en: I don't know where he is. He doesn't answer his phone.

translation.it: Cosa? Ma è il tuo compleanno.

translation.en: The next one is just a year away.
translation.it: Tanto il prossimo è fra un anno.

translation.en: You know what? I'm not the most important thing to him.
translation.it: Sai, non sono la sua priorità.

translation.en: In Martin's hierarchy, I'm way behind his buddies and his work.
translation.it: Per Martin vengono prima amici e lavoro.

translation.en: And most importantly, way behind him.
translation.it: E, prima di tutto, se stesso.

translation.en: How are you? How about lunch?
Etna. You were sleeping like a log. Didn't want to wake you. Time's a-wasting.
translation.it: Sull'Etna. Dormivi come un sasso. Non volevo svegliarti, ma il tempo vola.

translation.en: Yeah, time's a-wasting. Did you have fun?
translation.it: Già, quanto è vero. Ti sei divertito?

translation.en: Jesus. It was fucking awesome. You would have liked it.
translation.it: Puoi dirlo, è stato una figata. Sarebbe piaciuto anche a te.

translation.en: You can experience the sea and snow at the same time. Cool!
translation.it: Vedi sia il mare che la neve.

translation.en: Idiot! Don't you remember? We were supposed to go there together!
translation.it: Dovevamo andarci insieme, te lo sei scordato?

translation.en: Why have you left me all alone on my birthday?
translation.it: Mi hai lasciata sola al mio compleanno.

translation.en: [Martin] Jesus. Don't get so worked up.
With your weak heart, you shouldn't do that.
Fuck off with that heart argument again. Do you care about anything other than yourself?
translation.it: Fanculo a questa storia del cuore. Pensi solo a te stesso.

translation.en: -What am I to you? -You think I don't care about you?
translation.it: - Conto qualcosa per te? - Pensi di no?

translation.en: I've been looking for this for over an hour.
[in English] Are you lost, baby girl?
You had a bad reaction to the sedative.
I didn't know you have a heart problem.
Why am I here? Who the fuck you are? And why are you keeping me here?
translation.it: Perché sono qui? E tu chi cazzo sei, perché mi tieni qui?

translation.en: -Sit. I don't want you to faint again. -Answer me.
Do you wanna know why you are here, or not?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere perché sei qui o no?

translation.en: Thank you. I think you should have a drink.
What I am about to tell you is so incredible that I...
translation.it: Sto per dirti una cosa talmente assurda che...

translation.en: I wouldn't have believed it's true until I saw you at the airport.
translation.it: non ci avrei mai creduto, finché non ti ho rivista.

translation.en: In that moment, I understood that...
Five years ago, my whole life was changed.
translation.it: Cinque anni fa, la mia vita è cambiata.

translation.en: The bullet went through his heart...
translation.it: Il colpo gli ha attraversato il cuore

translation.en: I thought I would die too.
When my heart stop, I saw you.
Every day, I had this image in front of my eyes.
translation.it: Ho ripensato a quell'immagine ogni singolo giorno.

translation.en: I was looking for you around the world.
translation.it: Ti ho cercato in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: Somewhere inside me, I had this feeling of certainty that...
translation.it: Non so bene come, ma una parte di me ne era sicura.

translation.en: one day you would stand in front of me and be mine.
translation.it: Un giorno ti avrei rivisto e saresti stata mia.

translation.en: Nobody owns me. I'm not an object.
translation.it: Non sono di nessuno, non sono un oggetto.

translation.en: You can't have me just like that; kidnap me and think that I'm all yours.
translation.it: Non basta rapirmi e dare per scontato che adesso sia tua.

translation.en: But that's why I'm giving you a chance to fall in love with me.
translation.it: Perciò ti do la possibilità di innamorarti di me.

translation.en: Not because I made you do it,
But I've got a boyfriend who is going to look for me.
translation.it: Ho un ragazzo, mi starà cercando.

translation.en: I've got family, friends... I've got my own life.
translation.it: Ho una famiglia, degli amici... La mia vita.

translation.en: I don't need a chance for love from you!
translation.it: Non mi servono le tue possibilità.

translation.en: So, I kindly ask you to let me the fuck out!
translation.it: Quindi ti chiedo gentilmente di farmi andare via, cazzo!
Il tuo ragazzo non ti merita.

translation.en: My people have taken your stuff from the room...
translation.it: I miei uomini hanno preso le tue cose.

translation.en: and left a note for Martin. It says that...
translation.it: Hanno lasciato un biglietto, con scritto...

translation.en: you're coming back to Poland, moving out...
translation.it: che torni in Polonia, cambi casa

translation.en: I won't do anything without your permission.
translation.it: Non ti farò niente, senza il tuo permesso.

translation.en: I'll wait until you want me,
you desire me, and come to me yourself.
translation.it: che mi desideri, che tu venga da me.

translation.en: I'm not used to tolerating disobedience.
I'd do anything so you can fall in love with me.
translation.it: Farò di tutto per farti innamorare.

translation.en: If next year, on your birthday, nothing change, I'll set you free.
translation.it: Se al tuo compleanno vorrai andartene, ti libererò.

translation.en: Now, you put down the gun...
or this will be stop being funny.
Do you really wanna kill me?
Many have tried. It's not that easy.
translation.it: Ci hanno provato in tanti, non è facile.

translation.en: But you have to know that he deserved it.
translation.it: Ma sappi che se lo meritava.

translation.en: He had been hurting children. Cheating and stealing on his family.
translation.it: Ha fatto del male a dei bambini, ha tradito e derubato la sua famiglia.

translation.en: He killed himself with what he'd been doing.
translation.it: Le sue azioni lo avevano già ucciso.

translation.en: It wasn't me who changed your clothes. It was the maid.
translation.it: Non ti ho cambiato io, ma la domestica.

translation.en: It's... It's one of the advantages of being a boss.
translation.it: Uno dei vantaggi di essere un boss.

translation.en: So, tell one of your butlers to bring my cell phone and laptop.
translation.it: Di' ai tuoi maggiordomi di portarmi cellulare e portatile.

translation.en: I can see you've got your strength back.
You will have your cell phone and your laptop when it's the right time.
translation.it: Li riavrai quando sarà il momento.

translation.en: if you need anything, Domenico is here to help you.
translation.it: se ti serve qualcosa, chiedi a Domenico.

translation.en: Be ready in two hours, because we need to buy some stuff before we depart.
translation.it: Preparati, dobbiamo fare acquisti prima di partire.

translation.en: Depart? Where to? What are you talking about?
translation.it: Partire? Per andare dove? Ma che cosa stai dicendo?

translation.en: I'm not flying anywhere, unless it's Poland.
translation.it: L'unico posto dove andrò è la Polonia.
- ma un ordine. - Stammi a sentire,

translation.en: I'm not a bag of potatoes that you can transfer without my permission.
translation.it: non sono un sacco di patate che puoi spedire a tuo piacimento.

translation.en: If that's your idea of how falling in love with you looks, you're fucking wrong.
translation.it: Se pensi di farmi innamorare così, ti sbagli di grosso.

translation.en: This is what you call a temper?
How many Polish girls do you know?
It looks like one is all I need to know.
translation.it: A quanto pare, me ne basta una.

translation.en: It will be a good year.
I just need to react quicker, 'cause I lose my vigilance when I'm around you.
translation.it: Devo solo essere più veloce, quando sono con te mi distraggo.

translation.en: Domenico brought all of your stuff.
translation.it: Qua ci sono le tue cose.

translation.en: Impressive amount of shoes for a five-day holiday.
translation.it: Quante scarpe, per cinque giorni di vacanza.

translation.en: I'll do my best to help you.
I think your boss wants me to gain weight.
translation.it: Il tuo capo vuole che ingrassi.

translation.en: I think he just wants to take good care of you, you know?
translation.it: Vuole solo prendersi cura di te.

translation.en: But I think you're here to help me with everything what I need.
So, I need you to sit down...
Today, I have some business to take care of.
translation.it: Oggi devo occuparmi di alcune faccende.

translation.en: I said, I'm not going anywhere.
Legend says that Zeus used to hide Typhon there--
translation.it: Secondo la leggenda, Zeus vi nascose Tifone,

translation.en: a monster of 100 heads-- and that it's still trying to escape.
translation.it: un mostro con 100 teste che sta ancora cercando di fuggire.

translation.en: So, Typhon didn't fall in love with Zeus in 365 days.
translation.it: Quindi Tifone non si è innamorato di Zeus in 365 giorni.

translation.en: Or I guarantee you, this is the last time you'll see it.
translation.it: O ti assicuro che è l'ultima volta che mi vedrai così.

translation.en: and I'm gonna decide when I'm going to see it.
[in English] Please, I need help. Can you help me?
Someone kidnapped me, and I need help.
translation.it: Mi hanno rapito, mi serve aiuto.

translation.en: [in English] Are you lost, baby girl?
If you feel like running, you should wear a different kind of shoes.
translation.it: Per andare a correre, ti conviene cambiare scarpe.

translation.en: You have to accept the situation.
The faster, the better for you.
You can either make it hard for both of us for the next year, or...
translation.it: Puoi rendere la vita difficile a entrambi per un anno intero, oppure...

translation.en: take part in an adventure that fate has given you.
translation.it: vivere l'avventura che ti riservava il destino.

translation.en: Sometimes, we have to make our own luck.
translation.it: A volte, dobbiamo esserne gli artefici.

translation.en: Is it true what you said earlier?
translation.it: È vero quello che mi hai detto?

translation.en: That you won't touch me without my permission.
translation.it: Che non mi toccherai senza il mio permesso.

translation.en: I'm not the monster you think I am.
translation.it: Non sono il mostro che pensi.

translation.en: I want my cell phone and laptop. Now.
translation.it: Voglio il mio cellulare e il mio portatile. Subito.

translation.en: But you don't have to kill him.
I will give him couple of lessons.
So, what do you actually do?
You want me to accept a year-long declaration,
translation.it: Se vuoi che accetti di restare qui per un anno,

translation.en: I have rights to know what's waiting for me.
You will know exactly what you need to know.
translation.it: Saprai tutto quello che ti serve.
Una specie di società per azioni,

translation.en: The whole is a part of a bigger operation. But the details are useless...
translation.it: È tutto parte di un'operazione più grande, ma non ti serve sapere di più.

translation.en: I was chosen the head of this family after my dad's death.
translation.it: Mio padre è morto e sono stato scelto come capo.

translation.en: It was not what I wished for.
I would never have come to Sicily.
translation.it: Non sarei mai venuta in Sicilia.

translation.en: I have to tell you something, though. I was offered a new job in Sicily.
translation.it: Devo dirti una cosa. Mi hanno offerto un lavoro in Sicilia.

translation.en: It's the best hotel on the island.
I was given a yearly contract.
translation.it: È un contratto di un anno.

translation.en: Come on, stop worrying. You'll see.
You'll come to visit and fall in love with the place as I have.
translation.it: Ti innamorerai anche tu di questo posto.

translation.en: We'll be guests at a few offshore parties,
translation.it: Andremo ad alcune feste nel continente,

translation.en: so take that under consideration while packing your bag.
Do you want anything from me, or you're just looking?
translation.it: Ti serve qualcosa, o vuoi solo guardarmi?

translation.en: Why are you looking at it?
when your entire life is based on taking everything with force,
translation.it: Quando sei abituato a prendere tutto con la forza,

translation.en: it's hard to react in a different way.
translation.it: è difficile reagire in modo diverso.

translation.en: Especially if someone is taking away a pleasure you really desire...
translation.it: Soprattutto se ti portano via qualcosa che desideri davvero.

translation.en: [in Polish] Just untie me, you fucking wop, and I'll show you...
translation.it: Slegami, italiano del cazzo, e ti faccio vedere...

translation.en: You have to earn the pleasure.
[in English] Are you talking about me?
I've just said to my cousin that you're a marvelous, gentle woman.
translation.it: Ho detto a mio cugino che sei una donna meravigliosa e gentile.

translation.en: [in English] Couldn't you use the bathroom?
[in English] Which period is that? Early Michelangelo or late Caravaggio?
translation.it: A che periodo risale? Primo Michelangelo o tardo Caravaggio?

translation.en: the slayer of lions and tiny women.
translation.it: l'uccisore di leoni ed esili donne.

translation.en: Maybe I don't want to stop.
Open the door. I want to leave.
Let me out. Open the door.
I'll do anything I want with you.
translation.it: Farò quello che voglio con te.

translation.en: I was hoping you would do that.
Every time you move, it widens more and more.
translation.it: Se ti muovi, si allarga sempre di più.

translation.en: I'm gonna show you what you're missing.
that you can't resist me anymore.
I have access to absolutely every bit of your body.
translation.it: posso arrivare a ogni singolo centimetro del tuo corpo.

translation.en: Are you asking me to begin?
I'm gonna fuck you so hard...
that they will hear you scream in Warsaw.
translation.it: che ti sentiranno urlare a Varsavia.

translation.en: We need to be in one of my clubs in two hours.
translation.it: Tra due ore dobbiamo essere in un mio locale.

translation.en: And then, he's gonna kill me.
Some people will join us, and we will have to discuss some matters with them.
translation.it: Verranno certe persone per discutere di certe cose.

translation.en: You are going to play Mafia, aren't you?
translation.it: Giochi a fare il mafioso, eh?

translation.en: This is not a fucking joke, okay?
[in English] Okay, you wait here. Just one minute.
translation.it: Ok, aspetta qui. Ci metto un minuto.

translation.en: What the hell are you wearing?
A couple thousand euro of yours.
translation.it: Un paio di migliaia di euro. Tuoi.

translation.en: Are you afraid that I am too good at it?
translation.it: Hai paura che ci riesca troppo bene?

translation.en: and could get inside me without taking it off.
You will be mine. I guarantee it.
Then I'll do anything I want, anytime I want with you.
translation.it: E allora farò di te quello che voglio, quando voglio.

translation.en: [Laura] What's going on? Did you kill him?
translation.it: - Che succede? L'hai ucciso? - Non sono affari tuoi.

translation.en: -[Massimo] It's none of your business. -You killed him?
translation.it: - Che succede? L'hai ucciso? - Non sono affari tuoi. L'hai ucciso?

translation.en: I shot his hands. I wouldn't have had to do it
translation.it: Gli ho sparato alle mani. Non avrei dovuto, se non ti fossi vestita e comportata da troia.

translation.en: if you didn't dress like a whore and put on your little show.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto, se non ti fossi vestita e comportata da troia.

translation.en: So, that's my fault that your friend tried to rape me?
translation.it: È colpa mia se ha cercato di stuprarmi?

translation.en: -[in English] Fuck off! Leave me alone. -Where you going?
-Stop it. Where are you going? -No. Get off me.
[Massimo] I'm so grateful that you're alive.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu sia viva.

translation.en: But in the same time, I wanna kill you.
translation.it: Ma ho anche voglia di ammazzarti.

translation.en: Thank God I was so close.
I can't lose you. I don't want to.
I just wonder if you aren't too tired for an evening surprise.
translation.it: Non vorrei ti stancassi, stasera c'è una sorpresa.
Le tue sorprese mi fanno paura.

translation.en: Are you fucking crazy? I have nothing to wear!
translation.it: Sei impazzito? Non ho niente da mettere.

translation.en: do you mind if I ask you to dance with me?
translation.it: posso chiederti di ballare con me?
Tu che chiedi qualcosa, Don Massimo?

translation.en: [in English] The first and real love of Massimo.
translation.it: Il primo e vero amore di Massimo.

translation.en: I left her the day you landed in Sicily.
translation.it: L'ho lasciata al tuo arrivo in Sicilia.

translation.en: Your portraits have been hanging in my house for years.
translation.it: I tuoi ritratti sono appesi in casa mia da anni.

translation.en: Nobody believed that I will ever find you.
translation.it: Nessuno credeva che ti avrei trovata.

translation.en: And... she didn't believe at all.
I will never let anyone hurt you.
translation.it: non lascerò che ti facciano del male.

translation.en: Domenico will take you to the airport tomorrow.
You said that you want to visit your family.
translation.it: Non volevi vedere la tua famiglia?

translation.en: -Yes, but-- -There's an apartment waiting for you in Warsaw.
translation.it: - Sì, ma... - A Varsavia troverai un appartamento.

translation.en: I wasn't talking to you. I'll call you back.
translation.it: Non dicevo a te, ti richiamo.

translation.en: I am going to kill you!
Just tell me one thing, okay?

translation.it: Che cazzo è successo in Sicilia?

translation.en: -Martin. I had enough of him. -Did he piss you off?
translation.it: - Martin. Mi aveva stufata. - Ti ha fatto incazzare?

translation.en: Jesus, I know it sounds ridiculous. I didn't want it, but things happened.
translation.it: So che sembra ridicolo. Non volevo, ma sono cose che succedono.

translation.en: Don't make me force it out of you. Tell me, who is it?
translation.it: Sputa il rospo, dai. Lui chi è?

translation.en: What do you mean? He's got special needs? Is he sick?
translation.it: Cioè? Ha esigenze speciali? Qualche malattia?

translation.en: I know, he has flat feet.
Imagine a strong alpha male, who always knows what he wants.
translation.it: È un maschio alfa, che sa sempre quello che vuole.

translation.en: He is your caretaker and your defender.
translation.it: Uno che bada a te, che ti difende.

translation.en: When you are with him, you feel like a little girl.
translation.it: Con lui, ti senti come una bambina.

translation.en: He makes all your sexual fantasies come true.
translation.it: E fa avverare tutte le tue fantasie sessuali.

translation.en: What's more, he is one meter, 90 centimeters tall,
translation.it: E poi è alto un metro e novanta,

translation.en: has absolutely no body fat, and has been molded by God himself.
translation.it: non ha un filo di grasso e ha un corpo da Dio.

translation.en: Did God mold his dick, too?
He comes from a rich, traditional Sicilian family.
translation.it: Viene da una ricca famiglia vecchio stampo.

translation.en: They don't take foreigners for wives.
translation.it: Non si sposano con le straniere.

translation.en: Right, now spare me the bullshit.
translation.it: Bene, ora evita di dirmi stronzate.

translation.en: I was kidnapped by a gangster, and then I fell in love with him.
translation.it: Un mafioso mi ha rapita e mi sono innamorata di lui.

translation.en: And the worst thing is that they keep me in the dark.
translation.it: E la cosa peggiore è che non mi dicono nulla.

translation.en: They treat me like some kind of doll.
translation.it: Mi trattano come una specie di bambola.

translation.en: They sent me to Poland, and I still don't know a single thing.
translation.it: Mi hanno spedita qui e non so un bel niente.

translation.en: That's why you need to fucking back out. Do you understand?
translation.it: Ecco perché devi tirartene fuori, cazzo.

translation.en: Fuck all the Massimos, Martins, and all the other mozzarellas.
translation.it: Fanculo ai Massimo, ai Martin e agli altri mozzarella.

translation.en: Darius, just fucking look at you! Please, don't leave, though.
translation.it: Darius, ma guardati, cazzo. Ti prego, non andartene.

translation.en: Can you tell me why you woke me up in the middle of the night? It's 1:00 p.m.
translation.it: Mi spieghi perché mi hai svegliato a notte fonda? Sono le 13.

translation.en: Greg, I want some volume here.
translation.it: Greg, voglio un po' di volume.

translation.en: What? Did you suddenly have a stroke?
translation.it: Che c'è? Ti è venuto un ictus?

translation.en: I was offered the position of general manager at Preston.
translation.it: Mi vogliono come direttrice generale al Preston.

translation.en: You will be fucking General Preston!
translation.it: Sarai la direttrice del Preston, cazzo!

translation.en: Great. Mozzarella turned her brain into pesto.
translation.it: Fantastico. Mozzarella le ha mandato in pappa il cervello. Anzi, in pesto.

translation.en: Now, that is some serious volume.
You're right. I'm not going to just lie down and smell nice.
translation.it: Hai ragione, non farò la bambolina.

translation.en: I'd like to lie down and smell nice...
There is a line to your ass.
It's for you. From that gentleman.
translation.it: Per te. Da parte di quel signore.

translation.en: Where were you all this time?
I have nothing to say to you.
Laura, please. At least let me explain, and then I'll leave.
translation.it: Laura, ti prego. Almeno lascia che ti spieghi, poi me ne vado.

translation.en: Explain how your dick ended up in a different girl's ass?
translation.it: Cosa mi spieghi? Come ti sei scopato un'altra?

translation.en: The moment you ran off from that pool...
I thought this through. You were right. I ran after you, but you weren't there.
translation.it: Ci ho pensato, avevi ragione. Ti ho cercato, ma non c'eri.

translation.en: I started looking for you. It got dark, so I went back to the hotel.
translation.it: Si è fatto buio e sono tornato in albergo.

translation.en: I found your letter, read it... and lost my mind.
translation.it: Ho trovato la tua lettera, l'ho letta e... ho perso la testa.

translation.en: I decided I needed to get fucked up. I called Michał...
that fucking first drink was the last thing that I remember from that evening.
translation.it: Di quella sera ricordo solo di aver bevuto un cocktail.

translation.en: It doesn't change a thing if you remember or not.
translation.it: Non cambia nulla se non ricordi.
Non ci sono ma che tengano, Martin!

translation.en: We belong to two different worlds. There is no room for a woman in your life.
translation.it: Le nostre vite sono troppo diverse. E nella tua non c'è posto per una donna.

translation.en: And I am not going to be your toy. Do you understand?
translation.it: Non sarò il tuo giocattolo, capito?

translation.en: But that is in the past.
-But I don't miss you. -So, it was all fake?
translation.it: - Tu a me no. - Era tutta una messinscena?

translation.en: There was nothing between us? It wasn't fake, but it wasn't a healthy relationship.
translation.it: - Non c'era niente tra noi? - Non era una relazione sana.

translation.en: -Honey, let's talk. -We have nothing to talk about!
translation.it: - Parliamone. - Non c'è nulla da dire.

translation.en: No! You have already told me what you had to say.
translation.it: No! Mi hai già detto tutto.
- Ora lasciami in pace. Arrivederci. - Aspetta.

translation.en: [Massimo, in English] I don't understand what you two are saying,
translation.it: Beh, non capisco quello che dite,

translation.en: but it's rather clear that she wants you to leave.
translation.it: ma è chiaro che lei vuole che tu te ne vada.

translation.en: Do I have to say it so you'll understand?
But I think you've already met Martin.
translation.it: Ma credo che tu lo conosca già.

translation.en: [in Polish] Martin, come in! Come in, please!
Do you have any idea what I've been through?
translation.it: Hai idea di quello che ho passato?

translation.en: -♪ All this magic in the air ♪ -No.
-Wanna bet? -♪ Secured my place, I'm here to stay ♪
But do me a favor, and don't tell them exactly what you do.
translation.it: Ma fammi un favore e non dire di cosa ti occupi davvero.

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
[in Polish] Laura! You look great as a blonde!
[in English] Massimo. Nice to meet you.
[in Polish] Who is he? And what does he do?
translation.it: Chi è? E di cosa si occupa?

translation.en: [in English] My mom is asking what do you do for a living.
translation.it: Mia madre vuole sapere che lavoro fai.

translation.en: [laughs] Really? You will be the first in our family.
translation.it: Davvero? Sarai il primo della nostra famiglia.

translation.en: So, what are your intentions with our daughter?
translation.it: Allora, che intenzioni hai con nostra figlia?

translation.en: [in English] Sorry we didn't wait for you, but I have to travel to Palermo.
translation.it: Scusa se non ti abbiamo aspettato, ma devo tornare a Palermo.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm not hungry yet.

translation.it: - Cosa ti senti? - Niente di che.

translation.en: Domenico will take you to the doctor.
nobody from Poland can come to our wedding.
translation.it: al matrimonio non verrà nessuno dalla Polonia.

translation.en: You said it yourself that you don't want them to know what I do.
translation.it: Sei tu che non vuoi che sappiano del mio lavoro.

translation.en: But I would love to have my best friend to be next to me.
translation.it: Ma vorrei avere vicina la mia migliore amica.

translation.en: I think you don't like me, Mario.
that you have caused some commotion...
I will arrange... your friend's arrival.
[in Polish] What a ride! Fuck me!
I can't believe it! Are you fucking out of your mind?
You have known each other for two months!
Stop it. Give me one. You are pregnant.
translation.it: - Smettila. E dammene una. - Sei incinta.

translation.en: I'll smoke two for your sake. Fuck!
translation.it: Ne fumo due per te. Cazzo!

translation.en: I don't get it. He forced you, right?
translation.it: Non capisco. Ti ha costretto, vero?

translation.en: I'll tear him apart when I see him!
translation.it: Appena lo vedo lo faccio a pezzi.

translation.en: Olga, he doesn't know I'm pregnant!
translation.it: Olga, non sa che sono incinta.

translation.en: He doesn't. And when he proposed, I said yes willingly.
translation.it: Non ne ha idea. E ho accettato di sposarlo di mia volontà.

translation.en: Laura, you are trapped in a cage!
Don't you see it? It's a golden cage, but you are still a fucking prisoner!
translation.it: Non te ne accorgi? Una gabbia dorata, certo, ma sei una cazzo di prigioniera.

translation.en: Do you know what you are up against?
translation.it: Sai in che casino ti stai mettendo?

translation.en: What are you talking about? A cage? -What am I supposed to do? -I don't know.
translation.it: - In gabbia? E cosa dovrei fare? - Non lo so.

translation.en: Stop yelling. Do you take me for a fool? You think I didn't know what I was doing?
translation.it: Non urlare, non sono scema. Sapevo quello che facevo.

translation.en: I love you, do you hear me?
I will always be there for you.
We will raise the child together.
It will be a beautiful child with beautiful parents. Not smart, though, but still.
translation.it: Visti i genitori sarà un bel bambino, anche se non molto intelligente.

translation.en: [in Polish] How long do we have to wait?
How long can you pamper yourself?
I want to be with him and keep the child.
translation.it: Starò con lui e terrò il bambino.

translation.en: [Laura, in Polish] Well, you could stay for a while in Sicily.
translation.it: Beh, potresti fermarti un po' in Sicilia.

translation.en: What do you think I am here for?
[Olga] Okay, stop talking me up. Just call him.
[Massimo] How long does it take to try on a dress?
translation.it: Quanto ci vuole per un vestito?

translation.en: [in English] Can we talk after dinner?
